name: HorrorExperience
description:
Hello everyone !

This project is the first one we do as a team.

Doing this game was a pretty cool experience for us to learn to work on Unity, and so the team working. It's how the project name was born ^^

It is a little prototype at the moment. We'll complete it later.

We hope you will recognize some environment :)

Have a nicely scary day !

The team qGk ;)
